Sentencas: Zirconia-coated NiO powder was prepared by a newly developed surface-induced coating using thermal hydrolysis of Zr(NO3)(2) .
Titulo: Preparation of ZrO2-coated NiO powder using surface-induced coating

Sentencas: 6H(2)O in a mixed solvent of alcohol and water.
Titulo: Preparation of ZrO2-coated NiO powder using surface-induced coating

Sentencas: Amorphous zirconium hydroxide was uniformly coated on the surface of NiO powder with the thickness of 20 nm.
Titulo: Preparation of ZrO2-coated NiO powder using surface-induced coating

Sentencas: The ZrO2 coating layer was crystallized to tetragonal ZrO2 with the size of 40-60 nm at 900 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation of ZrO2-coated NiO powder using surface-induced coating

Sentencas: The coated NiO powder containing 15 vol.% ZrO2, was found to have a similar isoelectric point to that of the ZrO2.
Titulo: Preparation of ZrO2-coated NiO powder using surface-induced coating

Sentencas: The surface-induced ZrO2 coating was a more efficient method for the prevention of Ni sintering than the mechanical mixing.
Titulo: Preparation of ZrO2-coated NiO powder using surface-induced coating
